Applications.Name: Spotify
Applications.Description: A webplayer using spotify API and SDK to show and play all your spotify playlists.

Designs.Name: 3DSinWave
Designs.Description: A 3D image of cubes changing sizes to emulate a drop in water.

Designs.Name: DotsOnShape
Designs.Description: Shapes with a different number of verticies with dots travelling along them.

Designs.Name: Factorial
Designs.Description: Draws a factorial tree (at the moment is all preset, will work on getting input from user).

Designs.Name: Snowfall
Designs.Description: It is a snowfall scene where the more snow that has hit the ground the higher the snow layer will appear.

Designs.Name: Starfield
Designs.Description: A pseudo 3D image of a starfield. Emulates flying through space at high speeds.
